content.query:
use nyc_taxi_discovery
select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]

-- finding duplicates LocationId
select 
     LocationId,
     count(1) as no_of_records
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]
group by LocationId
having count(1)>1
order by LocationId
